name: Floral Dress
description: A maxi wrap dress with a delicate floral pattern in shades of blue. The dress features a V-neckline, short sleeves, and a tie waist. It is made from a lightweight, breathable fabric and is perfect for summer.

name: Chambray Shirt
description: A classic chambray shirt with a relaxed fit. The shirt features a collar, long sleeves, and a single chest pocket. It is made from a durable, wrinkle-resistant fabric and is perfect for everyday wear.

name: Denim Jacket
description: A denim jacket with a cropped fit and distressed details. The jacket features a collar, long sleeves, and two front pockets. It is made from a sturdy, durable fabric and is perfect for fall and spring.
